title: Visual accessibility
text:
Overview
Placeholder for work on visual accessibility. The aim is to have a resource for topics that consider visual accessibility when designing course materials.






Learning Objectives




Colour blindness
Dyslexia
Autistic spectrum
…




Target Audience
Course developers


Prerequisites
None.

Citation

Please cite these materials if:

You adapted or used any of them in your own teaching.
These materials were useful for your research work. For example, you can cite us in the methods section of your paper: “We carried our analyses based on the recommendations in TODO.”.
